name: SUSTRONAUT_FIXED
description:
Sustronaut is a game whee you move around with your buddy and go to the finish line. The catch is your buddy's inputs are exactly your inputs but delayed by half a second. You are also connected with a physics simulated rope.

Controls:

[A, D]:  Horizontal Movement

[K]: Locks your buddy's movement .

[SPACE]: Jump

[L SHIFT]: Dash

[M]: Mute audio

You can hold space for auto wall jump and climb.

Hint:

You can use your locked buddy to make circular movements around him.

Hint2:

You can dash multiple times on air by using lock mechanic.
